CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the View Destination Info stage positioned above or below the Book Flight stage?
SRP.A: The View Destination Info stage is positioned {above} the Book Flight stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Search Travel Packages?
VE.A: The value of stage Search Travel Packages is {774}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage View Destination Info?
VE.A: The value of stage View Destination Info is {1361}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is View Destination Info, with a value of {1361}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Make Reservation, with a value of {166}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Select Accommodation to stage Book Flight?
SC.A: Decreased by {243} Thousand Tourists from stage Select Accommodation to stage Book Flight.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Book Flight to stage Make Reservation?
SC.A: Decreased by {22} Thousand Tourists from stage Book Flight to stage Make Reservation.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage View Destination Info to stage Search Travel Packages?
SC.A: Decreased by {587} Thousand Tourists from stage View Destination Info to stage Search Travel Packages.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 309? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {View Destination Info} stage has {1361}, the {Search Travel Packages} stage has {774}, the {Select Accommodation} stage has {431}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 177? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 309 and 602? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Book Flight to Make Reservation, or from stage View Destination Info to Search Travel Packages?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {View Destination Info} to {Search Travel Packages} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Search Travel Packages to Select Accommodation, from stage Book Flight to Make Reservation, or from stage View Destination Info to Search Travel Packages?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {View Destination Info} to stage {Search Travel Packages} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {View Destination Info} and {Search Travel Packages} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Book Flight} and {Make Reservation} stages.
